clip.quote: Your phone can be a money maker if you understand that it can be a money maker and have a strategy built on what you are going to make.
clip.why_clipworthy: It challenges the conventional view of phones as mere communication tools and positions them as powerful business assets.
clip.suggested_hook: Is your phone just a phone, or is it a money-making machine?
